p: It has been identified in samples from two outbreaks of gastroenteritis in retirement homes in Florida ( Rosen et al., 2000), as a single pathogen in patients with gastroenteritis ( Cascio et al., 1996), as well as in 20% of patients Dutch with gastroenteritis (Picobirnavirus IM) ( van Leeuwen et al., 2010). Its prevalence in the United Kingdom is estimated to be between 9% and 13% ( Gallimore et al., 1995).
